title: Teaching Assistant (TA)
description: Developed strong relationships with regular students, facilitating their understanding of web development concepts and contributing to a 25% improvement in their course averages.

title: Full-Stack Developer
stack: Python, JavaScript, Django, React, AngularJS, Cypress, Docker, AWS, CSS/CSS3, HTML/HTML5, PostgreSQL
description: Successfully migrated and rewrote a web application, improving UI/UX and code quality. This resulted in a 20% performance improvement.
